entries.content:
Creating delta memory for UserSessionSettings implementation.

Key accomplishment: Complete per-chat model selection persistence with event flow from UI dropdown → Extension → ChatInstance storage.

Critical gotcha discovered: CHAT_MODEL_CHANGED constant existed in ChatEventConstants.js but was missing from UI_EVENTS export in events.js, causing "No handlers for event: undefined" error. Fixed by adding it to the central UI_EVENTS constant.

✅ Delta memory created: user-session-settings-model-persistence-implementation.json

Complete implementation of per-chat model selection persistence:
- 8 files modified (3 created, 5 modified)
- UserSessionSettings micro-component following AllowedToolsTracker pattern
- Complete event flow: UI dropdown → ModelChangedHandler → Extension ModelSelectionHandler → ChatInstance
- Build succeeded with no errors
- Fixed critical bug: CHAT_MODEL_CHANGED missing from UI_EVENTS export

Ready for testing in live environment!
